results.content: I did not pay the standard price, but took a cheaper offer, so this course turned out very good for me as a newbie to Bootstrap. But, you could easily grasp the content of this course by studying the intro pages on their homepage, which I did simultaneously. The overall impression of the presenter was good, his tempo was just right and he threw in the occasional joke here and there :) I do miss the course material though!
